EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Webinar_Cloud Native Journey_Q415.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Pivotal's Cloud Native Journey Webinar 11/25
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/the-cloud-native-journey-with-simon-elisha> Wednesday, November 25, 2015 10:30 AM Mumbai /1:00 PM Singapore 4:00 PM Sydney REGISTER <http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/the-cloud-native-journey-with-simon-elisha> The ability to deliver software is no longer a differentiator. In fact, it's a basic requirement for survival. Companies that embrace cloud-native patterns of software delivery will survive, and companies that do not embrace them will not.
Register now <http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/the-cloud-native-journey-with-simon-elisha> for this informative webinar where we will:
- Look at the common patterns that distinguish cloud native companies and the architectures that they employ. - Discover that an opinionated platform, one that stretches from the infrastructure all the way to the application framework, rather than ad-hoc automation, is an essential component to an enterprise's cloud native journey. - Show that the combination of Pivotal Cloud Foundry and Spring is the complete cloud native platform.
Join us <http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/the-cloud-native-journey-with-simon-elisha> to hear from Simon Elisha, CTO & Director of Field Engineering and learn more!
The Pivotal Team
